topics.body: So I realized I had the original half-life and finally got around to playing it; is it just me or is the platforming in Xen not that great?  I might like the half life series, but it's no fucking wonder why black mesa the final version including Xen is taking so long cause if they simply remake Xen then everybody's going to go, "well why didn't you make it as good as the original?" and if they do make Xen better then everyone's going to go, "well why did you change it?"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547644bc636872462c520100#post_547644bc636872462c520100
Well, is just you jumping in floating plataformers and killing aliens in in alien bases, that's all in Xen. I was expecting more, but is just you walking in a Doom-esque level full of aliens.
